attributes.action: Require a licence for all Cyclist ,Ebikes,E Scooters  .insurance,Visible id.
attributes.additional_details:
Insurance id.should be held for the responsibility and protection of other Vehicles.And Specifically Pedestrians.Whom are at risk,From these Vehicles.Bikes e Scooters  that break the law,
A Bike.e scooter should have the same level of accountability as other Vehicle holders.
This is responsible @right.And this way they can be identified and tracked via cctv.When found to be breaking the law. Enforcement  will be required.Via Police by law to act.
Pavement Cycling ongoing safety concern.
attributes.background:
All Cyclist.Electric bikes@E Scooters.Should by law.Hold a licence and 
insurance @visible id/registration .So they can be tracked.
To make education and accountability normal.
This means when they break the law.Ex Riding on a pavement.
They can be punished in accordance with this crime.
